00017 /**
00018  * Run all of the usual tests, plus some extras, with some extensions loaded.
00019  * @ingroup querypath_tests
00020  */
00021 class QueryPathExtensionTest extends QueryPathTest {
00022 //class QueryPathExtensionTest extends PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase {
00023  public function testExtensions() {
00024    $this->assertNotNull(qp());
00025  }
00026  
00027  public function testHasExtension() {
00028    $this->assertTrue(QueryPathExtensionRegistry::hasExtension('StubExtensionOne'));
00029  }
00030  
00031  public function testStubToe() {
00032    $this->assertEquals(1, qp(DATA_FILE, 'unary')->stubToe()->find(':root > toe')->size());
00033  }
00034  
00035  public function testStuble() {
00036    $this->assertEquals('arg1arg2', qp(DATA_FILE)->stuble('arg1', 'arg2'));
00037  }
00038  
00039  /**
00040   * @expectedException QueryPathException
00041   */
00042  public function testNoRegistry() {
00043    QueryPathExtensionRegistry::$useRegistry = FALSE;
00044    try {
00045     qp(DATA_FILE)->stuble('arg1', 'arg2'); 
00046    }
00047    catch (QueryPathException $e) {
00048      QueryPathExtensionRegistry::$useRegistry = TRUE;
00049      throw $e;
00050    }
00051    
00052  }
00053  
00054  public function testExtend() {
00055    $this->assertFalse(QueryPathExtensionRegistry::hasExtension('StubExtensionThree'));
00056    QueryPathExtensionRegistry::extend('StubExtensionThree');
00057    $this->assertTrue(QueryPathExtensionRegistry::hasExtension('StubExtensionThree'));
00058  }
00059  
00060  /**
00061   * @expectedException QueryPathException
00062   */
00063  public function testAutoloadExtensions() {
00064    // FIXME: This isn't really much of a test.
00065    QueryPathExtensionRegistry::autoloadExtensions(FALSE);
00066    try {
00067     qp()->stubToe();
00068    }
00069    catch (Exception $e) {
00070      QueryPathExtensionRegistry::autoloadExtensions(TRUE);
00071      throw $e;
00072    }
00073  }
00074  
00075  /**
00076   * @expectedException QueryPathException
00077   */
00078  public function testCallFailure() {
00079    qp()->foo();
00080  }

00091 // Create a stub extension:
00092 /**
00093  * Create a stub extension
00094  *
00095  * @ingroup querypath_tests
00096  */
00097 class StubExtensionOne implements QueryPathExtension {
00098   private $qp = NULL;
00099   public function __construct(QueryPath $qp) {
00100     $this->qp = $qp;
00101   }
00102   
00103   public function stubToe() {
00104     $this->qp->find(':root')->append('<toe/>')->end();
00105     return $this->qp;
00106   }
00107 }
00108 /**
00109  * Create a stub extension
00110  *
00111  * @ingroup querypath_tests
00112  */
00113 class StubExtensionTwo implements QueryPathExtension {
00114   private $qp = NULL;
00115   public function __construct(QueryPath $qp) {
00116     $this->qp = $qp;
00117   }
00118   public function stuble($arg1, $arg2) {
00119     return $arg1 . $arg2;
00120   }
00121 }
00122 /**
00123  * Create a stub extension
00124  *
00125  * @ingroup querypath_tests
00126  */
00127 class StubExtensionThree implements QueryPathExtension {
00128   private $qp = NULL;
00129   public function __construct(QueryPath $qp) {
00130     $this->qp = $qp;
00131   }
00132   public function stuble($arg1, $arg2) {
